name: 資料分析（一）
comment: 本課程希望由具備科學教育或數學教育先備知識的同學選修.
description: What will be covered in this class will depend on the background of the participants as well as their interests. Basically, the following topics are intended to be covered to a certain extent. However, the technicality that we will go through will again be dependent on the background of the participants. Participants will be required to review the basics in hypothesis testing up to the level covered in a typical elementary statistics course. This course will emphasize on the conceptual understanding as well as the technicality behind the statistical concepts. Various data analyses procedures by means of SAS will be discussed in classes. Emphasis will be on the interpretation of the printouts. Course grade will be determined based on class attendance record, an exam, several exercises and one project.
goals: 具備基礎資料分析能力
具備批判研究分析方法的能力與態度
具備研究與教學之實務能力
